website_summaries.verdict: Great price point for a trickle charger that works on all 12-volt types of batteries.
pros: Ships with both alligator clips and ring connectors to work with many different types of batteries
Will protect your battery during the charging process from reverse polarity or short circuiting
Complies with IP65 standards for waterproof protection while using the trickle charger
cons: Warranty is only for the first 14 days

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a cheap piece of just at first glance. Now that I have had it for a few days I have changed my mind. This little thing is great. My harley battery died over the winter (go figure) and was totally dead no lights at all. I figured instead of buying a new battery why not try this little trickler a try. Threw it on and let it sit for 24 hours. To my surprise the bike fired up with no hesitation, I was blown away that it actually worked. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: NateMcBeans

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this trickle charger after reading good reviews. Not sure if the item we received is just a "lemon" or if its the product itself but it doesn't work at all. Doesn't charge whatsoever. Trying to contact seller to exchange. Will update review if it turns out well.
customer_reviews.author: DePra22

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: When I seen this little charger didn't have a review I had to give one. I have been needing one for a while and when I seen the price I had to give it a try. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger works great.
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great and keep my batteries fully optimal at all times when not in use, i used this charger on five batteries and not single on leaked or blew up and charges faster then my normal expensive charger. Shipping was also faster then i thought it would be, planning to buy a few more for family and friends, over month later it is still working 100%..
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I have not heard my husband complain and it must be working just fine. I noticed durning a inactive time he usually ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have not heard my husband complain and it must be working just fine. I noticed durning a inactive time he usually has to charge the battery because his motor cycle is dead. With the Trickle Charger he keeps it plugged in and it has always started. No more fussing about not starting. Good not to hear the fussing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, has for the Last Year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this smart charger and used it on my motorcycle for the last year and it has done well, I have no complaints. The included battery quick connect adapter is a big plus too. I would highly recommend this to anyone in need of a smart charger.
customer_reviews.author: 2016Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but they did cut a corner
customer_reviews.text: The charger works great, and does what its supposed to. On my particular unit, the crimp on the part that attaches to the battery was pretty bad, and came undone with light pressure. I had to get a kit with the proper connector to re-crimp a new one on properly. At the end of the day, the product is cheap though so the value for what you pay for isn't too far off
customer_reviews.author: epiklyfail

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Have another battery maintainer, and I can say this one is great. It even shows that that you are connected. My other other one does not. My other one doesn't show fully charged. Only a green light that tells you it's connected to the outlet. The fully charged light is not on. No more guessing for me. Will buy more for my at a and motorcycles.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this charger! Made of very cheap materials! After a few uses and less than one month it stopped charging and one of the battery clamps broke.. made of very light Gage metal and bent backwards when I clamped on the battery terminal...lol what a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Segorski

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today and it broke (see pic)! Of course by the time I need to winterize my battery my return window is expired! Doesn’t pay to plan ahead with these things... it’s cheap don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: These things are pretty much universal, I don't think the brand matters all that much when selecting one. But this one works very well. Wish it had longer cables so I didn't have to break out the extension cord, but that's a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I use this constantly, between my 2 cars and 4 motorcycles. It runs 24-7, always attached to one or another, and never falters or gets hot. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: T. Overstake

customer_reviews.title: One thing I like is the wires that attach to the battery
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up to the motorcycle battery and the battery came back to life. One thing I like is the wires that attach to the battery. I leave them connected and all I have to do is plug the charger in.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping my motorcycle battery charged during the depressing winter months. I could look over and see the flashing charging light mocking me as it knew I couldn't ride with 4 feet of snow on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gartland

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I bought several for our motorcycles and lawnmower. Also used it on regular car battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone with something they don't run very ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work real well. I charged my four wheeler and my mower. The monitoring light lets you know when the battery is fully charged. I would recommend this to anyone with something they don't run very often. No dead batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked fine until I tried to use it today almost a year after I bought it. The on light comes on and the charged light remains on, but the charging light does not. Checked with a volt meter and there is no output voltage.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Had new battery which was working great until I used this trickle charger recently
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy about charger. Had new battery which was working great until I used this trickle charger recently. It ruined my battery overnight; fried the cells in battery so it was a defective charger. My window for return has passed and now I’m stuck with a junk charger I wouldn’t use on any battery for fear of it ruining another battery. Yes everything was hooked up properly!
customer_reviews.author: Sumnerplace

customer_reviews.title: Overcharging batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product over the Battery Tender Jr hoping it would work the same. I was dismayed to find the Supernatto to way overcharge my batteries and seem to just never stop. Would not recommend and will pay extra for a working product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Frady

customer_reviews.title: Over charges battery?
customer_reviews.text: A good trickle charger will stop when the charge is full. This one seems to continue and boil water out of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dr L A Grayhills

customer_reviews.title: This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four sets of these trickle charges. They are working exactly as advertised. I hope that they last for many years. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought it for a custom ATV and motorcycle

customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to keep your battery tendered.

customer_reviews.text: I just purchased for winter storage of my jet ski's battery-it couldn't be more simple to use, time will tell if lasts or not, but right now, I'm pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works exactly as it should.

customer_reviews.title: Good value!

customer_reviews.title: Revised review
customer_reviews.text: I have this for almost 2months. And it is great. Comes with alligator clips or ring terminal so you can mount to battery permanently . My bike was dying over night.and this thing only took around 2hrs to charge from full dead.may have been faster but didn't check until 2hr. In short its well worth the $ in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: michael whaley jr

product_meta.title: Supernatto 12V Smart Compact Battery Trickle Charger Maintainer for Motorcycle ATV
product_meta.description:
12V Battery Charger for Motorcycle usable US plug Japan plug
* Socket compatible with plug type A 
(Mainly used, for instance, in North America and Central America and Japan) 
or you may need a converter to use this product

[Main feature]
■Trickle charge function allows during Winter
■The battery charger is for starting engines of 12V Motorcycle.
Perfect for all types of 12V batteries such as conventional type, sealed type, AGM type, Gel type.

■Voltage automatic detection:
Depends on the situation, the battery charger adjust the charging Voltage automatically.
Serious Over-discharging battery (to lower than 5 V) is NOT CHARGEABLE.

■Full Automatic charging
The battery charger has functions of full automatic charging and maintenance.
You can leave the battery charger connected with the battery while you are not riding a motorcycle. 

■Error protection
・Reverse polarity protection
・Short circuit protection

■LED display
You can see the charging status and maintenance conditions at a glance

■Easy replacement of charging cable
You can replace cable connector and Alligator clip depending on the situation.

■Dust and drip-proof comply with IP65.

[Warranty]
■Initial warranty: 14 days
■Out of warranty: 
・Short circuit caused by Miss-operation
・Malfunction after use (more than once)
・Things that are not related to performance such as dirt of the package or body of the battery charger.
feature_bullets: Reverse polarity and Shortcut-circuit connection protected.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
